title: Film-Noir | Red House (1947) Edward G. Robinson | A home built on secrets can never stand.

sources.title: Film-Noir | Red House (1947) Edward G. Robinson | A home built on secrets can never stand.
sources.description:
You won't guess the secret love story of "The Red House"!

Directed by Delmer Daves
Genres: Film-Noir, Mystery & Suspense, Thriller

Main actors:
Edward G. Robinson - Pete Morgan
Lon McCallister - Nath Storm
Judith Anderson - Ellen Morgan
Allene Roberts - Meg Morgan
Rory Calhoun - Teller
Julie London - Tibby Renton
Ona Munson - Mrs. Storm
Harry Shannon - Dr. Jonathan Byrne
Patricia Blake - Jeannie (in flashback scenes)


This film has Italian & Spanish dubbed audio options. Click on ⚙️  and choose your preferred audio & subtitle languages from the drop down menu.


Black & White version: https://youtu.be/rJW_C5YO7aU

00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:14 A haunting introduction sets the stage with eerie woods in a rural community centered around the Morgan farm.
07:45 Nath is hired at the Morgan farm amidst Pete’s cryptic warnings.
17:30 Tensions rise as Meg and Nath venture near forbidden areas.
30:25 Nath experiences mysterious screams in the woods at night.
50:10 Secrets of the past emerge, revealing dangerous connections.
1:10:00 Pete’s dark confession ties everything back to the red house.
1:25:15 A fateful showdown threatens lives and exposes the truth.
1:34:20 The red house burns as the past is finally put to rest.



 @CultCinemaClassics 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA
